code: import{useState}from'react';const useAPI=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const executeAPI=async apiCall=>{setLoading(true);try{const result=await apiCall();setData(result.data);setError(null);}catch(err){setError(err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return{data,loading,error,executeAPI};};export default useAPI;
